article_title: The U.S. Government Isn't Friendly Enough To Big Business

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: There is an increasing hue and cry in Washington against “crony capitalism” and “industrial policy”—the notion that the federal government unfairly supports certain large corporations and industries. But what we really should be concerned about is America’s “size- based” industrial policy, which actually favors small businesses to the detriment of the economy as a whole.
